author: wsjcom
title: Carbon Tax Would Be Fair and Clear the Air
text:
It’s great to see that the major car companies are committing to large investments in electric cars over the next several years (“Electric Cars Get Makeover,” Business & Technology, March 10). It confirms that big companies with a lot of skin in the game are predicting that consumers increasingly recognize that gas-powered vehicles are bad for our planet and want alternatives.
